pubinfo.publish: USDA Forest Service, Northern Research Station, Timber & Watershed Laboratory

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

descript.purpose: This data set is used by USDA Forest Service research scientists, staff and cooperators as base data for planning and management activities for the Fernow Experimental Forest.
descript.supplinf: The Fernow Experimental Forest is administered by the USDA Forest Service, Northern Research Station, Timber & Watershed Laboratory, Parsons, West Virginia.
descript.abstract: This data set contains the digital map locations and feature attributes of the research compartments on the Fernow Experimental Forest. The compartment polygons are identified by compartment code. Additional attribute information includes compartment area determined by the original survey. The dataset format is ESRI ArcGIS shapefile. The polygon features were created from original survey bearings and distances. Corners were located using sub-meter global positioning system data. Digital maps were revised using remotely sensed and other information.

cntperp.cntorg: USDA Forest Service, Northern Research Station, Timber & Watershed Laboratory

dataqual.logic: These data are believed to be logically consistent, though no tests were performed. Line geometry is topologically clean.
dataqual.complete: Contains an attributed feature set for all lands within the Fernow Experimental Forest. Changes may occur as better field data become available.

horizpa.horizpar: These data were compiled from base maps that meet National Map Accuracy Standards. The difference in positional accuracy between the feature locations and their digital map locations is unknown.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.
Perimeter of feature in internal units.

distinfo.distliab: This product is reproduced from geospatial information prepared by the U.S. Department of Agriculture, Forest Service. By removing the contents of this package or taking receipt of these files via electronic file transfer methods, you understand that the data stored on this media is in draft condition. Represented features may not be in an accurate geographic location. The Forest Service makes no expressed or implied warranty, including warranty of merchantability and fitness, with respect to the character, function, or capabilities of the data or their appropriateness for any user's purposes. The Forest Service reserves the right to correct, update, modify, or replace this geospatial information without notification. For more information, contact the Northern Research Station, Timber & Watershed Laboratory at 304-478-2000.
